Read noise calculation documentation¶

Readout_Noise.find_bias(light_ptc_pat, ptc_struct, gain)¶
Parameters:

  • light_ptc_pat (str) – path to the light ptc images

  • ptc_struct (str) – image file structure

  • gain (str) – low or high gain

Returns:

mean bias values and std in bias

Return type:

float

Readout_Noise.find_readout_noise(light_ptc_path, ptc_struct, gain)¶
Parameters:

  • light_ptc_path (str) – path to light ptc images

  • ptc_struct (str) – image file structure

  • gain (str) – high or low gain

Returns:

readout noise

Return type:

float

Readout_Noise.get_bias_images(light_ptc_path, ptc_struct, gain)¶
Parameters:

  • light_ptc_path (str) – path to light ptc images

  • ptc_struct (stry) – file name structure

  • gain (str) – high or low gain

Returns:

bias image numpy array

Return type:

numpy array

Readout_Noise.get_image(img_path, gain)¶
Parameters:

  • img_path (str) – path to the image.

  • gain (str) – high or low gain

Returns:

Image numpy array

Return type:

numpy array.

Readout_Noise.get_rastor_rn(light_ptc_path, ptc_struct, gain, n)¶
Parameters:

  • light_ptc_path (str) – Light ptc path

  • ptc_struct (str) – Image file structure

  • gain (str) – high or low gain

  • n (int) – raster scan size n x n

Returns:

raster scanned readout noise

Return type:

float

Readout_Noise.plot_histogram(img, path, rslt_path, gain)¶
Parameters:

  • img (numpy array.) – image array.

  • path (str.) – path to code.

  • rslt_path (path to the result images.) – path.

  • gain (str.) – high or low gain.

Readout_Noise.rms_std(img)¶
Parameters:

img (numpy array) – image array

Returns:

rms value, std, median value, pixels > 5RN, pixels > 8RN.

Return type:

float

Readout_Noise.save_image(img, path_name, img_title)¶
Parameters:

  • img (numpy array) – image array

  • path_name (str) – path where image to be saved.

  • img_title (str) – title of the image

Readout_Noise.write_csvfile(name, list_name)¶
Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the csv file.

  • list_name (list) – list of parameters to be included in csv file
